info.name: YouTube - remove "Recommended" section
info.description:
Removes "Recommended" section from the main page and from the pages of channels. Also removes "Trending" buttons.
Sign-in required.
info.additionalInfo:
Patch notes:
  • v.1.0.5 - 01.02.2016.
    • Also removes "Trending" buttons.
  • v.1.0.4 - 05.11.2015.
    • Bug fixes.
  • v.1.0.3 - 04.11.2015.
    • "Recommended" section on the main page is removed again.
  • v.1.0.2 - 25.10.2015.
    • Fixes of the ad blocking.
  • v.1.0.1 - 23.10.2015.
    • Added support of HTTPS.
    • Also works on the pages of channels.
  • v.1.0 - 22.10.2015.
